entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
